WRITING.TEXT: Thanks man, at the moment I am advertising them as wall art with a deckdock mounting kit. I would like to get the layers if clear coat done correctly for pro skatin'

Hahaha man before all that stuff... yeah i use arrows and shapes from my graphic design brain to lead the eye through some of my more chaotic pieces. These arn't to wild but some would be too wild without visual cues and shapes etc...
Hah i get that, I was unfortunate enough not to get to watch that show so cannot claim it as the influence it would of been... you have those regrets in life...

About to embark on some new designs and looking back at some of my older designs for inspiration. Molotow markers, brushes, coffee and plywood. Clear coated and mounted with nice deckdock system. Instagram.com/dunehaggar for more...
